nodes.text: Quad-Lo was a short, green alien male slaver.

He operated part of a slave circuit on the merchant station known as Bazarre. Three years after the Battle of Yavin, the Rebels known as Luke Skywalker and Lando Calrissian came to Bazarre to negotiate a sale for four black market Imperial TIE Fighters.

As soon as they entered the market place, Quad-Lo latched onto Lando's leg. He assumed Lando to be the natural property of a weapons dealer named Orion Ferret. He offered Ferret ten credits if he would agree to sell Lando to him as a slave. Ferret convinced Quad-Lo to leave Lando be, as he was not merchandise but a welcome guest at Bazarre.

Quad-Lo was a squat, green alien with three legs and an oversized humped-back that kept him in a permanently stooped position. He wore a red metal helmet that partially concealed the lower half of his face.
The character of Quad-Lo was created by Marvel Comics writers, David Michelinie and Walt Simonson.
